duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare high-quality chicken finger meals for customers to enjoy.
Work all shifts: opening shifts, closing shifts, and everything in between.
Assist with customer service, order processing, and payment handling.
Follow proper safety procedures when handling and preparing food.
Clean tables, floors, and other areas of the restaurant.
Take initiative and align with company policies.

education_certification.credential: No formal education required, paid training provided.
